title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Revolutionizing Audi's Welding Inspection System through AI (IND367)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过人工智能革新奥迪焊接检测系统 (IND367)
abstract: Learn how Audi implemented an AI-powered quality control system, transforming a traditional welding inspection processes. The system analyzes 1.5 million weld points across 300 vehicles per shift, expanding upon previous manual ultrasound inspections that covered only 5,000 points per vehicle. This AI integration enables production staff to focus on addressing potential anomalies, significantly enhancing quality monitoring efficiency. Following its success, Volkswagen Group is expanding this technology across multiple sites, including Audi Brussels, VW Emden, and Audi Ingolstadt. The implementation process includes site-specific AI model retraining to accommodate varying welding parameters, demonstrating a scalable approach to manufacturing quality control optimization.
abstract_cn: 了解奥迪如何实施AI驱动的质量控制系统,改造传统的焊接检测流程。该系统在每班次中分析300辆车的150万个焊点,相比之前每辆车仅覆盖5000个焊点的人工超声波检测有了大幅扩展。这种AI集成使生产人员能够专注于处理潜在异常,显著提升质量监控效率。在取得成功后,大众集团正在多个站点推广该技术,包括奥迪布鲁塞尔、大众埃姆登和奥迪英戈尔施塔特。实施过程包括针对不同焊接参数进行特定站点的AI模型重新训练,展示了制造质量控制优化的可扩展方法。
